name: GameJam: BrainJack (incomplete)
description:
Incomplete #cyberpunkjam entry

Click through the placeholder text!

Turn on your operators console!

Drill (button 2) a hole through the skull and laser (button 3) some brains to make room for the jack (button 4). Press button 1 when you're done. Hopefully you didn't kill your patient through violent trauma in the process.
